text: The student will investigate and understand that there are different types of weather on Earth. Key ideas include
subject: Science
subs: different types of weather have specific characteristics;
measuring, recording, and interpreting weather data allows for identification of weather patterns; and
tracking weather allows us to prepare for the weather and storms.

text: The student will investigate and understand that weather patterns and seasonal changes affect plants, animals, and their surroundings. Key ideas include
subject: Science
subs: weather and seasonal changes affect the growth and behavior of living things;
wind and weather can change the land; and
changes can happen quickly or slowly over time.
